sentences.english: Lianyungang has gradually become the research base of the continental bridge economy throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 连云港市已经逐步成为全国的陆桥经济研究基地。

sentences.english: Located in downtown of lianyungang city Tengxuan huoguo flourishing business street.
sentences.chinese: 腾轩火锅位于连云港市市中心繁华的商业街。

sentences.english: Lianyungang is situated in northernmost Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 连云港市位于江苏省的最北端。

sentences.english: The city of Lian Yungang has a typical structure of "one city, two towns".
sentences.chinese: 连云港市呈现出典型的一市双城式空间结构。
